text: 5:3 Esekiel 13:10; Hosea 13:13; Matyu 24:39; Luk 21:34-35; Jon 16:21-22Gumazamiziba kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, “Datɨrɨghɨn dughiar amɨrizim e batozɨ, e deravɨra iti.” Eghtɨ bizir me gasɨghasɨghamim bar zuamɨra me batogham, mati mɨzazir amizir naviba adaiba borim batasa isir mɨzaziba. Men tav osɨmtɨzir kam gitagh arɨ mangan kogham.
